meanings.definition: Most characteristic of or resembling a church.
meanings.sent1: The churchiest building in town is the one with the tallest steeple.
meanings.sent2: The old cathedral is the churchiest structure in the entire city.
meanings.sent3: The churchiest looking tree in the forest seemed to have branches reaching for the sky like a steeple.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the churchiest of them all, with intricate lace patterns resembling stained glass windows.
meanings.sent5: The churchiest smell in the air was the incense burning during the Sunday service.

meanings.definition: Showing the most devotion or adherence to church practices.
meanings.sent1: She was the churchiest member of the congregation, always volunteering for church events.
meanings.sent2: His actions were the churchiest of all, attending every service and event without fail.
meanings.sent3: The churchiest person in the group was known for always carrying a Bible in their bag.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the church was so strong, it was as if she wore a badge of 'churchiest' on her sleeve.
meanings.sent5: The churchiest voice in the choir belonged to the woman who sang with unwavering passion.
